snippet: Alex and Jamie Schneider, autistic 22-year-old identical twins from Long Island, have completed more than 120 races, including five marathons, over the past seven years.
abstract: Alex and Jamie Schneider, autistic, identical twins from Long Island, have completed more than 120 races, including five marathons, over the past seven years; are preparing for Long Island Marathon.
lead_paragraph: Alex and Jamie Schneider, autistic 22-year-old identical twins from Long Island, have completed more than 120 races, including five marathons, over the past seven years.

headline.seo: Autistic Twins Find a Release in Running
headline.main: Autistic Twins Are Hoping for Calm Races After the Trauma of Boston
headline.print_headline: Autistic Twins Are Hoping for Calm Races After the Trauma of Boston
